title: How Do I claim warranty, Someone bought pixel 2xl for me. I dont remember that guy. i live in pak.
content:
Hi, my phone shuts down when i connect it to a charger.

i have tried hard resetting, i have tried simple resetting, changed the chargers and data cables the issue still remains, my phone is in warrenty but i am unable to claim it because I asked a family friend who lives in uk to buy me a pixel. And he asked some guy where he works to do that. so i dont have the id of the person who bought it from you.
I live in PAKISTAN and here we dont have any outlet where i can buy a pixel. please help me. i have the box and everything.
